directions: Stir mayonnaise, chili sauce, apple cider vinegar, chili powder, and hot pepper sauce together in a bowl until smooth.
Put lettuce into a large bowl. Mix corn, kidney beans, and olives with the lettuce; serve with the dressing.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 (8 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
title: Mexican Salad Bowl
